paragraphs.content: Psalm 38
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 38

paragraphs.content: A Psalm of David, to bring to remembrance.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Psalm of David, to bring to remembrance.

paragraphs.content: O LORD, rebuke me not in thy wrath: neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O Lord, rebuke me not in thy wrath: neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.

paragraphs.content: For thine arrows stick fast in me, and thy hand presseth me sore.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thine arrows stick fast in me, and thy hand presseth me sore.

paragraphs.content: There is no soundness in my flesh because of thine anger; neither is there any rest in my bones because of my sin.
paragraphs.contentHtml: There is no soundness in my flesh because of thine anger; neither is there any rest in my bones because of my sin.

paragraphs.content: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.

paragraphs.content: My wounds stink and are corrupt because of my foolishness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My wounds stink and are corrupt because of my foolishness.

paragraphs.content: I am troubled; I am bowed down greatly; I go mourning all the day long.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am troubled; I am bowed down greatly; I go mourning all the day long.

paragraphs.content: For my loins are filled with a loathsome disease: and there is no soundness in my flesh.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For my loins are filled with a loathsome disease: and there is no soundness in my flesh.

paragraphs.content: I am feeble and sore broken: I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am feeble and sore broken: I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart.

paragraphs.content: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.

paragraphs.content: My heart panteth, my strength faileth me: as for the light of mine eyes, it also is gone from me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My heart panteth, my strength faileth me: as for the light of mine eyes, it also is gone from me.

paragraphs.content: My lovers and my friends stand aloof from my sore; and my kinsmen stand afar off.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My lovers and my friends stand aloof from my sore; and my kinsmen stand afar off.

paragraphs.content: They also that seek after my life lay snares for me: and they that seek my hurt speak mischievous things, and imagine deceits all the day long.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They also that seek after my life lay snares for me: and they that seek my hurt speak mischievous things, and imagine deceits all the day long.

paragraphs.content: But I, as a deaf man, heard not; and I was as a dumb man that openeth not his mouth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But I, as a deaf man, heard not; and I was as a dumb man that openeth not his mouth.

paragraphs.content: Thus I was as a man that heareth not, and in whose mouth are no reproofs.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thus I was as a man that heareth not, and in whose mouth are no reproofs.

paragraphs.content: For in thee, O LORD, do I hope: thou wilt hear, O Lord my God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For in thee, O Lord, do I hope: thou wilt hear, O Lord my God.

paragraphs.content: For I said, Hear me, lest otherwise they should rejoice over me: when my foot slippeth, they magnify themselves against me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I said, Hear me, lest otherwise they should rejoice over me: when my foot slippeth, they magnify themselves against me.

paragraphs.content: For I am ready to halt, and my sorrow is continually before me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I am ready to halt, and my sorrow is continually before me.

paragraphs.content: For I will declare mine iniquity; I will be sorry for my sin.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I will declare mine iniquity; I will be sorry for my sin.

paragraphs.content: But mine enemies are lively, and they are strong: and they that hate me wrongfully are multiplied.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But mine enemies are lively, and they are strong: and they that hate me wrongfully are multiplied.

paragraphs.content: They also that render evil for good are mine adversaries; because I follow the thing that good is.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They also that render evil for good are mine adversaries; because I follow the thing that good is.

paragraphs.content: Forsake me not, O LORD: O my God, be not far from me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Forsake me not, O Lord: O my God, be not far from me.

paragraphs.content: Make haste to help me, O Lord my salvation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Make haste to help me, O Lord my salvation.
